The motorcyclist is wearing a dark jacket and a helmet. The motorcyclist is moving at a moderate speed.

images_1_006.summary: The vehicle is driving on a city street with cars parked on the right side. From 0.0s to 9.0s, the vehicle maintains a steady speed. At 9.0s, the vehicle begins to slow down. From 9.0s to 13.7s, a young boy wearing a blue shirt and a black backpack suddenly appears from behind a parked black car on the left side of the road and starts crossing the street. The boy is looking down and doesn't seem to notice the approaching vehicle. This constitutes a ghost probing incident due to the sudden appearance of the boy from behind an obstruction.
